reviewText: The directions on this video are very simple to follow and the dishes are simply wonderful.  I put the video on and then copy the ingredient list, print it and go to the store. It is a wonderful buy.
Absolutely love this video! VERY easy to follow along. Beef & Broccoli is delicious, very happy with this video and hope to try more from this chef!
If you like Asian dishes  this video is a must.  His recipe's are so simple. my seven year old now knows how to make shrimp spring rolls...and the beef broccoli with oyster sauce is to die for.
